fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: Avenida de Manoteras número 46, 4º piso Madrid Spain
industry_forums: We take part on occasional hearings in the EU Parliament

CAP and agricultural issues

Food Law

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Direct membership: 
 
AB Azucarera Iberia S.L. (www.azucarera.es) is the Spanish sugar business of Associated British Foods (www.abf.co.uk)  
 
 
1. AGFAE - Asociación General de Fabricantes de Azúcar (webpage in construction) 
2. FIAB - Federación de Industrias de Alimentación y Bebidas  - www.fiab.es 
3. VITARTIS - Industria Alimentaria de Castilla y León -www.vitartis.es 
 
Indirect membership (through AGFAE or CEFS): 
 
1. ASSUC - European Association of Sugar Traders - www.assuc.eu 
2. CEFS - Comité European de Fabricants de Sucre - www. cefs.org 
3. PFP (Primary Food Processors) www.pfp-eu.org
goals__remit:
AB Azucarera S.L. is the Spanish sugar business of Associated British Foods (www.abf.co.uk)  
 
Production and commercialisation of sugar and derived coproducts from sugar beet and sugar cane.
